setBrightness

public void setBrightness(int hour,
                          boolean firstHalf,
                          int brightness)
Sets the brightness.

Parameters:
hour - The hour.
firstHalf - Sets the value for first half or not. True for 0 to 29, false for 30 to 59.
brightness - The brightness, from 1 to 255.
